medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 5 days ago as dull crampy pain located in lower abdominal quadrants, worsened after eating take-out food 1 day ago and localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Currently, the pain is constant and localized to RLQ, better than last night, worsened with movement and improved with rest and pain medication.
